content: अभिलाषः (°सः sometimes) A desire, wish, longing for, craving after; affection, longing of a lover, love, (usually with <ab>loc.</ab> of the object of desire); अतोऽभिलाषे प्रथमं तथाविधे मनो बबंध <ls>R. 3. 4</ls>; भव हृदय साभिलाषं <ls>Ś. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>Me. 110</ls> साभिलाषं निर्वर्ण्य <ls>Ś. 3</ls> casting a coveting or wistful look; न खलु सत्यमेव शकुंतलायां म माभिलाषः <ls>Ś. 2</ls>, <ls>Pt. 5. 67</ls>; sometimes with प्रति and <ab>acc.</ab>, or in <ab>comp.</ab>
